Have you seen the villagers? That might also help you to find the Orb back for me.
Tu devrais vraiment aller voir au village. Il me semble que plusieurs personnes veulent te voir.
You should really go to the village. It seems that several people want to see you.

Maybe some people can have infos about the Orb. Go and see if you can find some clues around there.

Somebody told me that I had to tell you to go to the shaman's. Isn't it weird?
